sentence.idiomatic: Your hairstyle today is very special.
This has a very special flavor, where does it come from?
I brought a very special gift for you.
Your clothes are a little wrinkled in the back.
This skirt got really wrinkled after I washed it, I have to iron it.
I think your jeans look really good wrinkly.
This clothing has to be ironed before it can be worn.
These clothes have been washed but not ironed.
Be careful, the soup is very hot.
That day I drank too much, I feel really dumb.
That day you left he came to look for you.
How come you didn't come that day? We waited for you for a long time.
There are still so many things I haven't finished, it looks like I'll have to work overtime today.
He phones you every day, it seems like he might be interested in you.
They don't take credit cards there. Good thing I brought cash, or it would have been so embarrassing.
Good thing I have a video game player in my bag, otherwise I would have been bored out of my mind waiting for you.
Good thing I'm smart, or I would have been scammed by you.
You can't eat fruit right after dinner, I've already reminded you so many times.
Every day my secretary reminds me of the following day's itinerary.
Tomorrow will be foggy. The Transportation Department reminds drivers to pay attention to safety.
Hurry and leave, otherwise you'll miss your plane.
You have to help me with something, otherwise I won't go to a movie with you.
Don't litter that banana peel, or it might be you who slips and falls on it next time.
Why are you looking at me?
Your shirt is very interesting.
What's the matter?
Its so wrinkled. Is this what is popular now?
No...I haven't ironed it. I haven't bought an iron.
Why don't you buy one?
I was thinking that after I buy one, then I will have to iron my clothes. It's such a pain!
Yikes! I can't believe you.
Mind you, the other day the boss also said my shirt was too wrinkled. It looks like i need to buy an iron. How much do they cost, approximately?
A decent one is only about two or three hundred RMB.
That cheap? Then I'll go and get one after work.
Don't forget to get an ironing board.
What's that?
You iron your clothes on it.
Good thing you reminded me. Otherwise I would have thought I could just iron them on my bed.
No way!
